Implementation Guide

Step 1: Generate Images

  • â¢ Add OPENAI_API_KEY to your .env.local
  • â¢ Run npm run generate-dalle -- --category=hero to batch hero assets
  • â¢ Or POST to /api/dalle with a preset payload when working in UI
  • â¢ Review outputs and crop to the target aspect ratio before committing

Step 2: Integrate Images

  • â¢ Generated files land in /public/images/ai-generated/<category>
  • â¢ Update imagePresets.ts if you add new variants
  • â¢ Reference assets with getImageUrl() helpers
  • â¢ Supply descriptive alt text for accessibility
  • â¢ Optimise exports with a lossless compressor after review
